name: Inuarashi
text: On Play: If your leader has the "Minks" type, up to 2 of your opponent's rested cost 5 or lower characters cannot be set active during their next Refresh Phase.

effect.text: If your leader has the "Minks" type, up to 2 of your opponent's rested cost 5 or lower characters cannot be set active during their next Refresh Phase.
